name: Satellite Repairman
description: All the planets in the system have suddenly decided that the galaxy isn’t big enough for all of them! You’re not sure who launched the first missile and it doesn’t really matter! You’ve got nothing to do with it… you are just… the satellite repairman!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics HD3000 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU Storage: 100 MB available space
